reviewText:
This is a collection of five short (30 minutes to an hour) hard-core films, four of which are legit grindhouse fare while the one in the middle is a new picture produced specifically for this release. Like all of the rest, though, that one too features horribly ugly, hairy people engaged in explicit sex. I will say though that at least one of the women looks decent and has very good on-camera skillz.

I think that I might have purchased my last DVD release labeled "grindhouse" because far more often and not, they end up being a disappointment. I expect subpar quality given the source material, but when it is such a distraction that you barely notice anything else, that's a problem particularly considering the premium pricetag that most of these carry. In the case of this one, the first film on the collection doesn't have audio AT ALL. Audio is spotty throughout the rest, with the exception of the new film. Even that one isn't without its hangups; the picture freezes a few times.

I have seen a few grindhouse releases with surprisingly-good quality but the last several have been huge busts. Speaking of huge busts, don't expect to see women here that  look anything like the ones on the front cover. In large part these chicks are ugly, hairy and not particularly hygienic.
